alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 25 at 1:48PM PST until December 27 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM MONDAY TO 6 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Strongest winds typically occur across exposed ridges and coastal headlands. * WHERE...Northern Humboldt Coast, Northern Trinity, Southern Trinity, Northwestern Mendocino Interior, Southwestern Mendocino Interior, Southeastern Mendocino Interior and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Monday to 6 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
